## Labels.prepare() function

Prepares a label set for insertion into a disk image as a `STR#` resource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function prepare(labels: Labels, lang: Language): Buffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  labels | <code>Labels</code> | The label set to prepare. |
|  lang | <code>Language</code> | The language to prepare the label set for. This determines the target character set. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Buffer`

A `Buffer` in `STR#` format.

## Remarks

Throws [LabelEncodingError](./dmg-license.labelencodingerror.md) if there is a problem encoding some of the labels.

Throws  if there is more than one error.
